content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, although our character background isn't relevant here, let us focus on discussing the rental price for the apartment in Duisburg. To start negotiations, propose a price that you find reasonable while keeping in mind my goal to maximize the rent.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
The rental price is 600 Euros per month.

[I agree to the price of [x] Euro!]

[I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]]

[TERMINATE]
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
